page.title: 02RELIGION
page.content: On the north side of the river there are no churches in this area.There is a small village{chapel}at Rodley but few people attend.Nearest churches are at Westbury on Severn and Newnham where attendances are also very small.On the south side church-goers also have to go outside this area to Arlingham where there is a{Parish {Church}.The average congregation according to local residents is about 20 but for a Christening it may rise to 70-80.There is a{Free Church {(Non-Conformist)}also at Arlingham which is lucky to get a 'handful' in its congregation.Residents believe the area has become apathetic concerning religion.
